name: skillbridge-backend
description: A fullâ€‘stack tutoring platform backend built as **Assignment Project**. SkillBridge connects learners with expert tutors. **Students** can browse tutor profiles, view availability, and book sessions instantly. **Tutors** can manage their profiles, set availability, and track their teaching sessions. **Admins** oversee the platform and manage users.

scripts.build: prisma generate && tsup src/server.ts --format esm --platform node --target node20 --outDir api --external pg-native
